dublin_core.dcvalue: mHealth Working Group MeetingWednesday April 20th 9 30 am 11 30 am Eastern US Held at FHI 4401 Wilson Blvd Suite 700 Arlington VA Dial in 1 888 651 5908 US Participant code 106181Topic mHealth for HIV AIDS Service Delivery see Presentation Slides Mobile phone based interventions to promote adherence to antiretroviral therapy a randomized controlled trial of SMS reminders in Kenya by Dr Harsha Thirumurthy UNC School of Public Health and the World Bank see Presentation Slides TxtAlert for antiretroviral therapy appointment reminders and rescheduling in South Africa by Marcha Neethling Praekelt Foundation see Presentation Slides Experience from Zambia using mobile phones in a PEPFAR funded project to prevent maternal to child transmission of HIV through 1 early testing of infants Results 160 and 2 getting HIV babies onto life saving treatment as soon as possible RemindMi by Andrew Kumwenda FHI Zambia see Presentation Slides 11 20 Invitation for collaboration on the K4Health mHealth Toolkit 11 25 Closing RemarksNew participants are also welcome to receive future group announcements by joining the listserv at http my ibpinitiative org mhealth If you have any questions please email the co chairs of the mHealth Working Group Kelly Keisling keisling kelly gmail com and Laura Raney lraney fhi org
